artist: Artist: Utagawa Toyohiro; Publisher: Yamadaya Sanshirō
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: triptych: courtesans chatting and playing instruments on a platform extending into the river; man at R seated near a tray of food grabs the hand of a young woman seated to his PL
markings: publisher seal on each sheet: 山田 {Yamada}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: on each sheet: 豊広画 {Toyohiro ga} (Painted by Toyohiro)
title: The Sixth Month, a Triptych
